name: R4B-Communication-R5-Communication
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R4B Communication into FHIR R5

element.display: A record of information transmitted from a sender to a receiver

target.display: A clinical or business level record of information being transmitted or shared
target.comment: R4B `Communication` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Communication`

element.display: Resources that pertain to this communication

target.display: Resources that pertain to this communication
target.comment: R4B `Communication.about` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Communication.about`
R4B `Communication.basedOn` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Communication.basedOn`
R4B `Communication.category` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Communication.category`
R4B `Communication.contained` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Communication.contained`

target.display: The Encounter during which this Communication was created
target.comment: R4B `Communication.encounter` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Communication.encounter`
R4B `Communication.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Communication.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`
R4B `Communication.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Communication.id`
R4B `Communication.identifier` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Communication.identifier`

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R4B `Communication.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Communication.implicitRules`
R4B `Communication.inResponseTo` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Communication.inResponseTo`
R4B `Communication.instantiatesCanonical` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Communication.instantiatesCanonical`
R4B `Communication.instantiatesUri` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Communication.instantiatesUri`
R4B `Communication.language` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Communication.language` - language made the binding required (from Preferred) for http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/all-languages|5.0.0
R4B `Communication.medium` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Communication.medium`
R4B `Communication.meta` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Communication.meta`

R4B `Communication.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Communication.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`
R4B `Communication.note` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R5 `Communication.note` - note has change due to type change: R4B `note` `Annotation` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R5 `note`

target.display: Part of referenced event (e.g. Communication, Procedure)
target.comment: R4B `Communication.partOf` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Communication.partOf`
R4B `Communication.payload` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Communication.payload`

R4B `Communication.payload.content[x]` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Communication.payload.content[x]` - content[x] has change due to type change: R4B content[x] string has no equivalent or mapped type in R5 content[x]; content[x] has change due to type change: R4B `content[x]` `Attachment` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `content[x]`

R4B `Communication.payload.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Communication.payload.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`
R4B `Communication.payload.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Communication.payload.id`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R4B `Communication.payload.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Communication.payload.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`

R4B `Communication.priority` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Communication.priority` - priority has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/request-priority|4.3.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/request-priority|5.0.0 (Equivalent)
R4B `Communication.received` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Communication.received`

target.display: Who the information is shared with
target.comment: R4B `Communication.recipient` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R5 `Communication.recipient` - recipient has change due to type change: R4B `recipient` `Reference` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R5 `recipient`

R4B `Communication.sender` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R5 `Communication.sender` - sender has change due to type change: R4B `sender` `Reference` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R5 `sender`
R4B `Communication.sent` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Communication.sent`

element.display: preparation | in-progress | not-done | on-hold | stopped | completed | entered-in-error | unknown

target.display: preparation | in-progress | not-done | on-hold | stopped | completed | entered-in-error | unknown
target.comment: R4B `Communication.status` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Communication.status` - status has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/event-status|4.3.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/event-status|5.0.0 (Equivalent)
R4B `Communication.statusReason` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Communication.statusReason`
R4B `Communication.subject` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Communication.subject`

element.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R4B `Communication.text` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Communication.text`
R4B `Communication.topic` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Communication.topic`
